name: Grand Theft Degens
description: An Ethereum native open-world competitive gaming title. Wager, Compete & Play with friends to run the city Combining Gaming Nostalgia with the Blockchain Welcome to the cutting-edge intersection of virtual reality and criminal intrigue â€“ a digital realm where chaos and cunning collide in a symphony of pixels and code. Behold, Grand Theft Degens. A Unity C# masterpiece that draws inspiration from previous titles, delivering a gaming experience that transcends boundaries and defies conventions. In this immersive universe, players are not mere spectators; they are architects of their fate, navigating a meticulously crafted cityscape filled with danger and opportunity. Whether traversing the urban sprawl individually or orchestrating strategic strikes as part of a formidable team, the stakes are high, and the risks even higher.
